price: او هغوى په خپله سمڅه كې درې سوه كاله پاتې شول، او دوى نهه نور هم پرې ورزيات كړي دي.
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
